modShortDescription: This mod adds a writing desk to the game, where you can craft schematics and books out of blueprints.
modDescription:
This mod adds a writing desk to the game, where you can craft schematics and books out of blueprints. You get blueprints by scraping books and schematics you already know.

The writing desk will be unlocked by intellect 8, so its more for endgame to create [books](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-books/) you cant find.

Translation for English and German included.

Written for A19.2, but should also work for all A18 and A19 versions.

**[Download](https://1drv.ms/u/s!AsAFcUo-08lq8GyTWjUsOTXTacsQ?e=e5wJ6n)**

**Credits:** Morlon
